name: Space Escape: 2D Shooter
description:
This is my customized 2D Shooter project. 

Modifications:

  1. New UI: font, background.
  2. Added 4 levels. Every level has a different map and more enemies, thus the difficulty increases.
  3. I created new music for the Main Menu and In-Game screens. 2 short soundtracks total.
  4. Minor changes: Added a Main Menu button to the Win Screen and a Restart Level Button to the Game Over Screen.

Credits:

Created by Maria Guzun.
